TITLE: 2003 toyota corollaput on a tire and drive!
ATTR: condition: good#drive: fwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 216012#size: compact#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: sedan
MESSAGE: i drove this champ from seattle a month ago. she runs fine; but apparently shes only running on three cylinders. i was told it could be a coil pack; or some other sensor causing it to misfire... all the spark plugs have already been changed; so its not that. whatever it is; its most likely not a huge fix. like i said; i drove her here from seattle and i still drove her daily until i hit a ridiculous pothole on the highway a few days ago and got a flat tire  bent the rim slightly as well; but im fairly sure the dent can be hammered out. in any case; i am dropping the price from $1300 to $900 (kbb valued at over $1500) because of this--you can easily acquire a new rim and tire for less than $100; but i am moving into my van full-time and cant handle the unnecessary responsibility of owning (and parking) two vehicles in the city. so; please understand prior to contacting me: you will need to purchase a new tire and rim and put it on; or tow it away! it is parked on a very quiet street with free parking and no street sweeping nonsense; so you can take as long as you wish to haul er away. besides that; she got an oil change recently... this is a great little car that im selling for a steal.#i moved down here for a family emergency from washington state a few months ago (bought the car the make the trip) and never switched the title to my name in a washington licensing office. this means that i will need to send the title and the fee (which i cant afford right now) to the wa dmv; get the new title; then sign that title over to the new owner. in the meantime; i am selling the car with a bill of sale (which buyer and i will sign in front of a notary) which states that i will sign over the new title to them within 60 days and that any traffic tickets that are incurred after the day of sale are the sole responsibility of the new owner.... so yeah. ive done my research and this is the best way to proceed.#216;012 on the odometer#beige/gold/champagne#tan cloth seats#manual 5-speed transmission#power windows and locks#am/fm radio doesnt work (but you dont need to listen to the garbage on the radio; anyway!); the head unit cd player also doesnt work; but i have a brand-new auxiliary cord that plays music beautifully (and loudly) out of the car speakers#she runs; drives; and is a reliable little vehicle. if youre looking for an affordable car; consider taking her off my hands.#email or text only:#show contact info#anytime... looking to sell asap!

(this is a commen but expensive repair with these cars when they get around 100;000 miles. i took care of it; so you dont have to! i can provide maintenance docchains for this and other work done during my ownerownersh this is a great car and needs an owner who can bring it back to glory and keep it adventuring out there on the road!

TITLE: toyota prius 2001

MESSAGE: after a year of falling in love with this lovely toyota prius 2001; its time for us to say good bye and part ways... it has been a year full of memories that we will always treasure; and this little fellow was a central part of all of it. he took us to the grand canyon and back; twice. he drove us through the overwhelming beauty of yosemite and sequoia. he watched us as our breath was taken away by the views on route 1. he was there when we became a family of three; and he was there when grandma and grandpa made their big journey through this beautiful land... we surely gonna miss him; and if it werent because we are returning back home; we wouldnt sell it at all.#so thats it: we are selling this wonderful trove of memories for just $2500. it runs great; it feels amazing and will keep your pockets full with its excellent fuel economy. i am the second owner and owned it for less than a year.  the original owner kept it in great shape; with an amazing record of maintenance. it was serviced recently and it has new tires too. you wont regret this. and he deserves a new family that will keep him adventuring through this world :-)

TITLE: 2008 honda fit sport (manual)
ATTR: condition: good#cylinders: 4 cylinders#drive: fwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 94000#paint color: blue#size: sub-compact#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: hatchback
MESSAGE: this is a fun-to-drive car and is perfect for getting around town and parking in small parking spaces.  the manual 5-speed transmission makes it more fun to drive and gives it a little more pep.  this is probably the most reliable car we have ever owned.  we change oil and filter religiously with mobil one synthetic oil.  it doesnt use any oil between changes.  weve done some preventive maintenance and it has never let us down.  as far as i know; everything works as it should.  we just had it smogged and as usual it passed with no problems.  my wife loves this car and she really doesnt want to sell it but we need to right now.  it only has about 94k miles on it (lower than typical for this year).  we had originally planned to drive it to 200k miles before selling it and there should be no problems driving it for 200k miles or more.  i see a lot of other fits of this vintage with 200k or more miles.  i think this is the last honda fit model that was actually built in japan; where the quality control is second to none.  it is a small car but has a lot of interior room. the back seats fold down in multiple configurations and ive been surprised several times how much you can put in the back of this little car.  and it gets great gas mileage. we consistently get over 30 mpg around town and about 40 mpg on longer trips on the highway. (thats typically better than the epa rating.) the color is light metallic blue and paint is in good condition.#features:#-----------#5-speed manual transmission (hard-to-find and fun to drive)#power windows#power locks#power mirrors#electric power steering#power brakes#cruise control#air conditioning (works great)#front/rear/side air bags (high rating for crash protection)#tire pressure monitors#anti-lock brakes#tilt steering wheel#interior air filtration#tachometer#front and rear cup holders#the sport model added features:#-----------------------------------------#15 inch alloy wheels#am/fm/cd/mp3 with aux. audio jack. 200 watts output to 6 speakers#underbody and rear spoilers#front fog lights#keyless entry#leather-wrapped steering wheel#remote anti-theft alarm system#extras included that i purchased:#----------------------------------------#factory service manual ($200 value)#tire chains (never used)#rear rubber mat to protect carpet#wheel locks#custom windshield sun shade#factory paint-matched side molding (for parking lot ding protection)#honda roll-up cover for rear compartment (to hide luggage)

i can put the stick into any gear. when the car is on; i can not put it into any gear at all.#pros:#- function and form type 1 suspension; set to a ridable height but can go a lot lower.#- gsr rear disk brake swap; done legit. no drilling holes since i bought the parts i need new for 99-00 civic si.#- gold skunk 2 lcas#- beaks bar#- i have an oem sir lip which will make it look aggressive.#- gsr wheels which look decent.#- 99 civic si tail lights#- 99 civic si rear bumper#- no name brand short ram intake#- full 99 civic si interior#- interior is clean (non-smoker)#- upgraded kicker rear speakers; ATTR: condition: excellent#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 17500#paint color: black#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: convertible
MESSAGE: original owner 2004 ford svt terminator mustang cobra convertible with just 17;500 miles. extremely rare car...only 1300 of these triple black convertibles made. production stopped for the new body style early in 2004. there were 13;000 of the 2003s built. this car features a factory eaton roots blower on a 4.6liter v8 and pushes over 400hp. it is also equipped with a 6speed manual tremec transmission (same used in vipers).  the 2003 and 2004 cobra were the only mustangs produced of that era with an independent rear suspension for handling. also the only convertibles produced with the (mercedes) cloth top. truly one of a kind collector car.#meticulously owned and detailed by collector/enthusiast.#always serviced by local ford dealership.#all records and paperwork.#engine is completely stock and unmolested.#upgrades include:#steeda strut tower brace#saleen convertible light bar#19 koenig custom wheels w/ staggered offset#flowmaster super 40 exhaust#h&r convertible specific lowering springs#hurst pistol grip shifter#tinted glass#cobra snake grill emblem#no disappointments. as clean under the hood as it is on the outside. only caught in the rain once. ridiculously babied. hate to see it go; however family and obligations force the sale.#$27000  no offers will be responded to by email or text. if you are a serious buyer come take a look. may consider some trades plus cash.

ATTR: VIN: 3GNEK18R9XG107389#condition: excellent#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: 4wd#fuel: gas#odometer: 117700#paint color: white#title status: clean#transmission: automatic#type: SUV
MESSAGE: 1999 chevy tahoe: 5.7 liter vortec v8; automatic; 4wd; leather; dual air bags.#this is a rare truck as it is the last year that chevy made the 2 door tahoe.#117;700 miles#this has been a great truck but i rarely drive it anymore since getting a more gas efficient car. now it only gets used for camping or ski trips which i dont do often enough to justify keeping it. i just spent over $4k replacing the power steering pump; the fuel injector; and the front end suspension (see below); so these parts should all last a long time.#pros:#all original (except for wheels and exhaust) and super clean#interior looks like new except for some minor cracking on the leather of the driver seat#low miles for its age#push button 4 wheel drive including rare auto 4wd option#new power steering pump#new fuel injector#new front end suspension parts (pitman arm; idler arm; upper and lower control arm bushings; and wheel bearing hubs)#cons:#ac works but has a leak. it will hold a can of ac refrigerant for about a week. i havent bothered to get this fixed because i rarely need ac where i live so its more economical to just add a can of refrigerant if im going somewhere warm.#the fuel pump might need to be replaced soon. the truck would occasionally get a little sluggish and misfire when under a heavy load (going 65-70mph up a steep hill) as if it wasnt getting enough fuel. the new fuel injector may have resolved this; but i havent driven it enough since replacing to know for sure.#im happy to answer any question you might have.

MESSAGE: 2004 chevrolet tahoe sport utility 4wd#bargain price $5;199#silver birch color; beige interior#good condition. runs like a charm. ex church vehicle. comfortable. reliable.#vin 1gnek13t04j309406 mileage 178;000#compare with a lesser vehicle listed on autotrader for $6;791 (and its only a 2wd and 211;00 miles) in the marin area of san francisco http://www.autotrader.com/cars-for-sale/vehicledetails.xhtml?listingid456108301&log0#4.6 stars our of 5 stars consumer reviews at edmunds https://www.edmunds.com/chevrolet/tahoe/2004/consumer-reviews/#285-horsepower; yet its more manageable than the super-size suburban.#on the road; the tahoe is smooth and stable; a rock. it has plenty of power and its brakes work well. the cabin is comfortable and familiar; friendly and functional; particularly after improvements that were made for 2003. turn off the highway and the tahoe handles gravel; rugged two-tracks; mud; and snow. in any kind of driving; its a great choice for someone who needs real carrying capacity.#improvements to the tahoe for 2004 further enhance its safety. new hydroboost brakes provide power assist even if the engine stalls or is turned off. a tire-pressure monitor is now standard. new options include electronic traction control and 17-inch all-weather tires. a major upgrade was made to the tahoe for 2003 for increased safety and reliability: gms stabilitrak electronic stability program became available for improved control on slippery surfaces. new airbag systems were designed to better protect children and adults of various sizes. adjustable pedals became available; enhancing comfort and safety for drivers of smaller stature. the brakes were improved. tahoe dazzles its passengers with entertainment possibilities.

TITLE: excellent 2002 tahoe z71
ATTR: condition: excellent#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: 4wd#fuel: gas#odometer: 154199#paint color: black#size: full-size#title status: clean#transmission: automatic#type: SUV
MESSAGE: i love this truck and am not sure i want to sell it; but it would be nice to have something with 7 seats.  i have babied it since we bought it as a certified pre-owned vehicle from a dealership in los gatos in 2004.  it has had all of the routine maintenance and runs great.  the interior is a 9.5 out of 10; with the only imperfection being the driver seat.  the exterior is a 8.5 out of 10.  i have a smog cert. in hand.  all the paint is in great shape with only a few imperfections from inconsiderate jerks in parking lots.  there are 2 mechanical issues; which are common for these chevy trucks.  the brake light and abs light come on intermittently.  it might be a sensor or the ebcm.  brakes work as they should; but i havent bothered to chase it down.  also; it probably needs to have the ac charged; because the belt sometimes chatters when it first comes on; but it blows cold.  if i put the time into fixing these 2 things; then ill keep the truck.  my older son would love to have it as his first car.  $6;500 obo.

MESSAGE: i dont need help selling and no emails just to ask if i still have the vehicle; ill remove the ad when sold.  no trades and no dealers.#this corvette grand sport is loaded with the 3lt package; navigation; bose stereo system; memory package; heads up display; factory npp dual mode exhaust and has only 34k easy miles.  clean carfax; no accidents and clear title in hand and in my name.  always garaged its entire life and never tracked or used for commuting.  this has always been a pleasure vehicle only.#all fluids were replaced by chevrolet dealer; all new brakes (fresh pads and oem rotors) and i had a full pfadt street wheel alignment performed a few months ago.  comes with brand new c7 gm z06 oem wheels with michelin pilot super sport run flat tires with less than 750 miles driven on them since new (if you dont like them theyre easy to sell for $3k or more!).   the car drives perfect; does not leak any oil or fluids and everything works as it should.  it has a manual transmission so it came with the dry sump oil system included with the ls3 engine that was hand build by gm and signed by the builder at the same factory where the ls7 and ls9 engines were built.  this gives you a better balanced ls3 engine with a forged crank that produces slightly more hp than a standard corvette; although rated the same officially by chevrolet.#not only does this car have the limited jetstream blue metallic tintcoat paint ($850 option) but it was ordered with museum delivery so the quality and fit/finish is much better than the average corvette.  full documentation and complete dealer service history since the day it was sold.#exterior  jetstream blue metallic tintcoat; interior  black

the corvette continues to offer driving enthusiasts the most bang for the buck; running neck-and-neck (and in some cases surpassing) exotic cars costing up to four times as much---or even more. no where else but in america can you find a sports car delivering 430 horsepower while returning an epa highway fuel economy figure of 26 miles per gallon#nowhere else but in america can you find a sports car delivering 430 horsepower while returning an epa highway fuel economy figure of 26 miles per gallon#the cars luxurious interior and comfortable ride make it perfect for daily commutes or long weekend getaways.#if you love your cars american and iconic; this vette is a sports car purists dream come true. experience awesome v8 power; amazing handling and an interior filled with more creature comforts than some luxury cars.#the 6.2-liter v8 suffers no shortage of power; a fact that you be reminded of with even the slightest touch of the accelerator. there is no need to work hard to handle this muscle machine. instead; it steers with ease and precision; dealing with twists and turns as effortlessly as imaginable.#although there is no denying the pleasure a 430 horsepower v8 delivers; with the corvette you also get a certain lack of refinement. the 6.2-liter ls3 small-block v8 feels gruff at idle and roars loudly when pressed into action.#its a purely american feel that instantly takes one back to the late 1960s muscle car era.

TITLE: 1997 jeep wrangler sahara tj
ATTR: condition: excellent#cylinders: 6 cylinders#drive: 4wd#fuel: gas#odometer: 62000#paint color: white#title status: clean#transmission: manual
MESSAGE: this jeep is in excellent shape for the year. it has only 68;xxx original miles! i bought it stock five years ago with only the warn winch and the auxiliary lights (piaa 200watts lo and hi beams) already installed; and i started its transformation to a very capable 4-wheeler. this is originally a fully loaded sahara with two tone color. a/c works perfect. in fact everything works great in the jeep. it has only seen light off road use.#engine: 4.0l in-line 6 cyl.; 5-speed transmission. i added banks cold air intake and banks exhaust systems; stainless headers; throttle body spacer; msd coil. i changed all the water hoses and belts. used only synthetic oil.#drive train: upgraded to 4:10 differentials; and i rebuilt the tranny and installed new clutch. i also rebuilt the rear axle; just so that i can have a baseline condition to start with. i added mickey thompson 15 rims and 33 tires (with matching spare).#suspension: installed 4 fully adjustable lift kit from rough country and bilstein shocks to match. it has long steel braided brake lines. added jks quick disconnect front sway bar links.#interior: stock two-tone sahara with no rips or scratches; added metal security glove box to lock up valuables when you have the top off. added sony stereo and alpine speakers.#exterior: front warn bumper and 8000lb warn winch; rear bumper is a smittybilt tubular and tire carrier and gas tank holder. extra driving light on either side of windshield.#extras: soft bikini top; original air intake.#registration good to april 2018#asking $14;995#call or text nick at 510-four six eight- 6611. serious inquiries only. no low ballers.

MESSAGE: this is probably the nicest tj on the market in the us. second owner car and has lived in and been serviced in los gatos since day 1. original owner never took it off road and i have only taken it off road twice.#super low mileage; interior and exterior excellent; strong 5 spd manual tranny and 4wd. 6 cylinder engine. soft top in great shape and plastic windows are still very good.#i believe the interior is sahara edition--i have included pictures so you can determine.#also; has brand new bf goodrich all terrain t/a tires (full set of 5); new set of pro comp adjustable shocks; new steering shock; wheel spacers and new rear brake drum cylinders. all work was done two months ago by 4wd parts in san jose...$3100 in parts and service. as most jeeps in this model and era; it does not have a/c.#finally; it has half doors with original plastic windows as well as after market; glass sliders. these are great because they open while driving the car and help to limit highway noise (vs. plastic version).
